titleStmt.title: Die Lunæ 7. Iunii 1647. An additionall ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in the Parliament of England for the more full indempnity of the officers and souldiers who have acted by authority, and for the service of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: Die Lunæ 7. Iunii 1647. An additionall ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in the Parliament of England for the more full indempnity of the officers and souldiers who have acted by authority, and for the service of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: for John Wright at the Kings Head in the old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Ordered to be printed and published 7 June 1647, by Joh. Browne Cler. Parliamentorum.
